# LLMs.txt - Documentation for AI Agents

This file helps AI assistants understand and navigate our documentation.

## Project Overview
Terminal-inspired documentation system with brutalist design aesthetics.

## Key Files
- /src/app/page.tsx - Homepage
- /src/app/docs/[...slug]/page.tsx - Documentation pages
- /src/components/ - UI components
- /content/ - MDX documentation content

## API Endpoints
None - This is a static documentation site.

## Key Concepts
- Terminal aesthetic with monospace fonts
- Sharp corners (no border-radius)
- Minimal, lowercase text style
- MDX support for rich content
- Responsive design

## Documentation Structure
/getting-started
  - introduction
  - installation
  - quick-start

/core-concepts
  - architecture
  - components
  - styling

/api-reference
  - configuration
  - functions
  - hooks

## How to Use This Documentation
1. Navigate using the sidebar
2. Search with cmd+K (coming soon)
3. Copy pages for offline reference
4. Ask AI for help understanding concepts

## Contact
For questions about this documentation, open an issue on GitHub.
